anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: Monkey D. Luffy refuses to let anyone or anything stand in the way of his quest to become the king of all pirates. With a course charted for the treacherous waters of the Grand Line and beyond, this is the story of the greatest adventure of all time.

episodes.title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!
episodes.description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out on his adventure to find the One Piece and become the Pirate King. Along the way he meets a boy named Koby who wants to become a Marine.

episodes.title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!
episodes.description: Luffy arrives at a town where the feared pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro is being held prisoner.

episodes.title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
episodes.description: Luffy and Zoro take on the tyrannical Marine captain Axe-Hand Morgan.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Grand Line! The Twin Capes and the Giant Whale
episodes.description: The crew finally reaches the Grand Line and encounters a whale named Laboon.

episodes.title: A Town That Welcomes Pirates? Setting Foot on Whisky Peak!
episodes.description: The Straw Hats arrive at the first island of the Grand Line, Whisky Peak.

anime.title: Naruto
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

episodes.title: Enter: Naruto Uzumaki!
episodes.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a troublemaking ninja-in-training, dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

episodes.title: My Name is Konohamaru!
episodes.description: Naruto meets the Third Hokage's grandson Konohamaru, who wants to learn his sexy technique.

episodes.title: Sasuke and Sakura: Friends or Foes?
episodes.description: Team 7 is put to a test by Kakashi Hatake to see if they are worthy of becoming Genin.

episodes.title: The Oath of Pain
episodes.description: Team 7 continues their training to climb trees using only their feet.

anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

episodes.title: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
episodes.description: After 100 years of peace, the Titans have broken through Wall Maria and are invading the city of Shiganshina. Eren Jaeger witnesses the death of his mother at the hands of a Titan.

episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
episodes.description: Eren, Mikasa, and Armin flee the city with other refugees. Years later, they begin their training to become soldiers.

episodes.title: Beast Titan
episodes.description: A new type of Titan appears, strange events unfold, and more mysteries are revealed.

episodes.title: I'm Home
episodes.description: Sasha returns to her hometown to warn them of an impending Titan attack.

anime.title: Demon Slayer
anime.description: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

episodes.title: Cruelty
episodes.description: Tanjiro Kamado's peaceful life is shattered after his family is slaughtered by a demon. His sister Nezuko is the sole survivor, but she has been transformed into a demon herself.

episodes.title: Trainer Sakonji Urokodaki
episodes.description: Tanjiro begins his training with Sakonji Urokodaki to become a demon slayer.

episodes.title: Muzan Kibutsuji
episodes.description: Tanjiro encounters Muzan Kibutsuji, the demon responsible for turning Nezuko into a demon.

episodes.title: Mount Natagumo
episodes.description: Tanjiro and his fellow demon slayers are sent to Mount Natagumo to investigate.

anime.title: My Hero Academia
anime.description: In a world where people with superpowers (known as 'Quirks') are the norm, Izuku Midoriya has dreams of one day becoming a Hero, despite being bullied by his classmates for not having a Quirk.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.description: Despite being born Quirkless, Izuku Midoriya still dreams of becoming a hero. One day he meets his idol, the greatest hero All Might.

episodes.title: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodes.description: All Might reveals the truth behind his power and offers Izuku a chance to inherit his Quirk.

episodes.title: That's the Idea, Ochaco
episodes.description: Class 1-A prepares for the U.A. Sports Festival, a chance for students to showcase their abilities.

episodes.title: Roaring Sports Festival
episodes.description: The U.A. Sports Festival begins with the obstacle race event.
